title: Portfolio Website
shortDescription: A personal website showcasing skills and projects creatively.
fullDetails: A fully responsive portfolio website with smooth animations, showcasing skills, projects, and contact information. Built to highlight creativity and professionalism.

title: E-Commerce App
shortDescription: An online store for browsing and purchasing various products.
fullDetails: A modern e-commerce web app that features user authentication, product categories, a shopping cart, and a secure checkout process. Designed for ease of use and scalability.

title: Audiophile
shortDescription: Organize tasks effectively with priority and deadline management.
fullDetails: A productivity app that helps users create, organize, and track tasks. It includes features like categorization, priority levels, and due date reminders.

title: Recipe Finder
shortDescription: Search for recipes by ingredients or dish name.
fullDetails: A web app allowing users to search for recipes by entering ingredients or a dish name. Includes nutritional information and step-by-step instructions.

title: Blog Platform
shortDescription: A blogging platform for creating and sharing stories easily.
fullDetails: A multi-user blogging platform featuring an editor, comment system, and post categories. Built for writers to share their stories with a broad audience.
